articleList.title: Cloned horses may be headed for US racetracks
articleList.author: Amar Toor
articleList.content: yyylesstanimg src=yyyhttp://cdn2.sbnation.com/entry_photo_images/8747333/Horserace_520133030_large.jpgyyyyyygreattanyyylesstanpyyygreattanA US federal judge this week ruled that a major horse association must include cloned horses in its registry, in a move that could set the stage for labcreated animals to participate in future races. As yyylesstana href='http://www.reuters.com/article/2013/08/13/ususacloninghorsesidUSBRE97C01V20130813' target='_blank'yyygreattanReuters reportsyyylesstan/ayyygreattan, US District Court Judge Mary Lou Robinson said Monday that she will order the American Quarter Horse Association (AQHA) to begin accepting cloned horses on its registry, upholding a juryyyys decision handed down last month.yyylesstan/pyyygreattan yyylesstanpyyygreattanThe AQHA came under fire last year, when two Texas breeders sued the organization on the grounds that excluding cloned horses violated federal antimonopoly laws. The association argued that it had the right to reject cloned horses because it operates as a private organization. The AQHAyyys registry...yyylesstan/pyyygreattan yyylesstanpyyygreattan yyylesstana href='http://www.theverge.com/2013/8/14/4620168/clonedhorsesmustbeallowedonregistryjudgerules'yyygreattanContinue reading…yyylesstan/ayyygreattan yyylesstan/pyyygreattan

articleList.title: Faulty fire extinguisher wiring found on three Boeing 787 Dreamliners
articleList.author: Sam Byford
articleList.content: yyylesstanimg src='http://cdn2.sbnation.com/entry_photo_images/8747397/repo_0110_large.jpg'yyygreattanyyylesstanpyyygreattanBoeing's 787 Dreamliner has hit its latest problem — Japanese airline ANA says that three of its 20strong fleet have shown an electrical wiring issue with their engine fire extinguishers. An airline spokesperson told yyylesstana target=yyy_blankyyy href=yyyhttp://www.reuters.com/article/2013/08/14/usboeingdreamlineranawiringidUSBRE97D09E20130814?feedType=RSSyyyyyygreattanReutersyyylesstan/ayyygreattan that the discovery was first made during preflight maintenance in Tokyo.yyylesstan/pyyygreattan yyylesstanpyyygreattanyyylesstan/pyyygreattan yyylesstanpyyygreattan yyylesstana href='http://www.theverge.com/2013/8/14/4620188/anafindsfaultwithdreamlinerfireextinguisher'yyygreattanContinue reading…yyylesstan/ayyygreattan yyylesstan/pyyygreattan
